=== Objectives ===

This team focuses on the clarity, organization, and content of OklahomaTeam wiki pages.  The team wiki, as a whole, should be intuitive and simple to navigate, so that all visitors can easily and quickly find what they seek.

If you have any questions, contact a team member.
